name: Small Samurai
description:
--- Can't play? ---

In some browser the game wont load. if it dose not work try some other browsers like, Brave , Firefox or Chrome.

--- Game Info ---

this is a small little game made in one and a half weeks. 

it will 100% have some bugs and there is a possibility that if you have a monitor under 1980x 720 the scaling of some UI may look wierd or be of screen. though its not confirmed.
